name: Lab-grown meat prices - NextBigFuture (2017) and United States Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS) (2017)
title: Lab-grown meat prices - NextBigFuture (2017) and United States Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS) (2017)
description:
Data is based on industry and company reports from lab-scale (not commercial-scale) production of in-vitro beef.

Prices have been reported in US$ per pound (lb) of lab-grown beef. We have converted this to US$ per kilogram using a conversion factor of 0.454.

sources.name: Lab-grown beef prices - NextBigFuture (2017)
sources.dataPublishedBy: Next Big Future (2017). "Lab grown meat prices have dropped 30,000 times in less than four years and are about 3-4 times more expensive than regular ground beef"
sources.additionalInfo:
Data is based on industry and company reports from lab-scale (not commercial-scale) production of in-vitro beef.

Prices have been reported in US$ per pound (lb) of lab-grown beef. We have converted this to US$ per kilogram using a conversion factor of 0.454.
